channel.title: Serverless on Matias Pan
channel.description: Recent content in Serverless on Matias Pan

item.title: Writing a face detection function for OpenFaaS
item.description: There is a new term in town that has been making its way to all of us for a couple of years now: Serverless. When I first heard this I was kind of confused as to what it meant. Everybody seemed to have an opinion about it but there were no real answers. The following definition from serverless-stack helped me clarify a bit: Serverless computing (or serverless for short), is an execution model where the cloud provider is responsible for executing a piece of code by dynamically allocating the resources.
